attributes.action: BUILD A TESCO ON THE ISLE OF SKYE!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS IS MUCH NEEDED AS THE NEAREST ONE IS 100 MILES AWAY. WE HAVE 2 SMALL CO-OPS WHICH ARENT VERY GOOD. THIS WOULD BE A GREAT ASSET TO THE COMMUNITY ON THE ISLE OF SKYE IN THE WEST OF SCOTLAND. THE ISLAND WHICH IS CONNECTED BY A FREE TOLL FREE BRIDGE TO THE MAINLAND IS INHABITATED BY 10,000+. PLEASE SIGN YOUR NAME!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
